    Description
    (package private) void
    actionPhaseOrderTest()
    Test actionPhaseOrderTest verifies the correct setting of action phase order as a result of assistant cards' selection.
    (package private) void
    addPlayerTest()
    This method aims at verifying the correct insertion of players to the game.
    (package private) void
    CalculateInfluenceWithTowersTest()
    This method verifies the correct calculation of the influence excluding the towers.
    (package private) void
    calculateIslandOwnerTest()
    This method verifies if the calculateIslandOwner method returns the correct playerID of the player that is the owner of the island
    (package private) void
    checkGameOverForIslandNumber()
    This method verifies the correct working of checkGameOver method according to the island number
    (package private) void
    checkGameOverForTowers()
    This method verifies the correct working of checkGameOver method according to the number of towers
    (package private) void
    cloudEmptinessTest()
    Test cloudEmptinessTest verifies the correct refill of cloud students when basket is empty: if a cloud cannot be fully refilled then no students are added to it.
    (package private) void
    cloudInstantiationTest()
    Method cloudInstantiationTest verifies the correct instantiation of the newly created cloud tiles
    (package private) void
    deckInstantiationTest()
    Method deckInstantiationTest verifies the correct instantiation of the Assistant card deck
    (package private) void
    fillIslandTest()
    This method verifies that the island opposite to mother nature's one is the one and only which receives no student at the beginning of the game.
    (package private) Game
    gameSetup(int playersNumber)
    Method gameSetup is a utility method the presets a game instance in order to avoid repeated instantiations of Game's objects.
    (package private) void
    getEmptyClouds()
    This method verifies if the Cloud with the ID returned by the getEmptyClouds method is empty
    (package private) void
    getPlayableAssistantCardTest()
    Method getPlayableAssistantCardTest verifies the correct update of a player's Assistant deck after a play assistand card phase.
    (package private) void
    giveAssistantDeck()
    This method verifies that a player receives the proper deck of assistant cards, which must also be removed from the assistantDecks attribute of game.
    (package private) void
    hasDuplicatesTest()
    This test helps verifying that a student tile is not choosen more than once in a movement.
    (package private) void
    influenceAndMergeTest()
    The following tests performs an island merge between two islands and moves Mother Nature two times, in order to assure the correct update of the islands' arraylist.
    (package private) void
    initiatePlayerLobby()
    This method aims at checking the correct insertion of students to a player's lobby.
    (package private) void
    isCardPlayableTest()
    Test isCardPlayableTest verifies the correct update of Assistant cards that can be played by each player.
    (package private) void
    islandInstantiationTest()
    islandInstantiationTest examines the correct indexing of the newly created island tiles.
    (package private) void
    islandOwnerTest()
    Test islandOwnerTest verifies the correct setting of an island's owner and the resulting possibility of moving towers onto it.
    (package private) void
    isMoveMNLegal()
    Method isMoveMNLegal is responsible for verifying that Mother Nature moves are legal according to the numMoves written on the Assistant card played
    (package private) void
    isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegalTest()
    Method isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegalTest verifies that method isMoveStudentFromLobby returns the correct boolean values according to the availability of places in the board's table
    (package private) void
    isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal()
    Method isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal verifies if method isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal returns the correct boolean value according to the correct cloudID
    (package private) void
    lastAssistantCardTest()
    Test lastAssistantCard verifies the correct setting of last round conditions after a player plays his last assistant card.
    (package private) void
    lastRoundTest()
    This method verifies the correct setting of last round conditions as a result of basket's emptiness.
    (package private) void
    mergeTwoIslandsTest()
    Method mergeTwoIslandsTest verifies the correct merge of two islands as a result of towers' placement onto neighbour islands.
    (package private) void
    motherNatureInstantiationTest()
    This method is responsible for checking the instantiation of a single mother nature at the start of the game.
    (package private) void
    moveAndInfluenceTest()
    Test moveAndInfluenceTest verifies the correct execution of a combined action of Mother nature movement and influence computation, as planned during action phase.
    (package private) void
    moveMNTest()
    This method verifies the correct working of moveMotherNature method checking the old and the new position of Mother Nature before and after the move
    (package private) void
    moveStudentFromLobbyToIslandTest()
    This method verifies that method moveStudentFromLobby works corectly when I want to move a student to an island according to the current Mother Nature position
    (package private) void
    moveStudentFromLobbyToTableTest()
    This method verifies that moveStudentFromLobby wors correctly when I want to move a student to the table according to the availability of the places in the Table
    (package private) void
    moveStudentsToLobby()
    This method verifies the size of the lobby before and after the addition of a student
    (package private) void
    nullPlayerNameTest()
    Test nullPlayerNameTest verifies that invalid players are not added to a game's instance.
    (package private) void
    playAssistantCard()
    playAssistantCard method is responsible for verifying that card are removed from player's deck and added to the game current turn deck
    (package private) void
    refillTwoCloudsTest()
    refillCloudsTest method is responsible for verifying that clouds are rightly filled with students according to the number of players.
    (package private) void
    resetAssistantCardTest()
    Test resetAssistantCardTest verifies the correct reset of current turn's assistant cards at the end of a game round.
    (package private) void
    studentsInfluenceTest()
    This method verifies the correct calculation of the influence of each player
    (package private) void
    studentsToFullTableTest()

    teacherInstantiationTest()
    teacherInstantiationTest method verifies that five different teachers are correctly instantiated and added to game's teachers attribute.
    (package private) void
    teacherMovementTest()
    This method verifies the correct working of the method that moves the teachers according to their color

      GameTest()

  • Method Details

    • gameSetup

      Game gameSetup(int playersNumber)
      Method gameSetup is a utility method the presets a game instance in order to avoid repeated instantiations of Game's objects.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - number of players to be added to Game.
      Returns:
      Game instance used to test game conditions.

    • addPlayerTest

      @Test void addPlayerTest()
      This method aims at verifying the correct insertion of players to the game.

    • nullPlayerNameTest

      @Test void nullPlayerNameTest()
      Test nullPlayerNameTest verifies that invalid players are not added to a game's instance.

    • teacherInstantiationTest

      @Test void teacherInstantiationTest()
      teacherInstantiationTest method verifies that five different teachers are correctly instantiated and added to game's teachers attribute.

    • islandInstantiationTest

      @Test void islandInstantiationTest()
      islandInstantiationTest examines the correct indexing of the newly created island tiles.

    • motherNatureInstantiationTest

      @Test void motherNatureInstantiationTest()
      This method is responsible for checking the instantiation of a single mother nature at the start of the game. It also checks the absence of students in mother nature's tile.

    • cloudInstantiationTest

      @Test void cloudInstantiationTest()
      Method cloudInstantiationTest verifies the correct instantiation of the newly created cloud tiles

    • deckInstantiationTest

      @Test void deckInstantiationTest()
      Method deckInstantiationTest verifies the correct instantiation of the Assistant card deck

    • fillIslandTest

      @Test void fillIslandTest()
      This method verifies that the island opposite to mother nature's one is the one and only which receives no student at the beginning of the game.

    • initiatePlayerLobby

      @Test void initiatePlayerLobby()
      This method aims at checking the correct insertion of students to a player's lobby. It also checks that the basket is missing te correct amount of students tile.

    • giveAssistantDeck

      @Test void giveAssistantDeck()
      This method verifies that a player receives the proper deck of assistant cards, which must also be removed from the assistantDecks attribute of game.

    • refillTwoCloudsTest

      @Test void refillTwoCloudsTest()
      refillCloudsTest method is responsible for verifying that clouds are rightly filled with students according to the number of players.

    • playAssistantCard

      @Test void playAssistantCard()
      playAssistantCard method is responsible for verifying that card are removed from player's deck and added to the game current turn deck

    • lastAssistantCardTest

      @Test void lastAssistantCardTest()
      Test lastAssistantCard verifies the correct setting of last round conditions after a player plays his last assistant card.

    • isMoveMNLegal

      @Test void isMoveMNLegal()
      Method isMoveMNLegal is responsible for verifying that Mother Nature moves are legal according to the numMoves written on the Assistant card played

    • isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegalTest

      @Test void isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegalTest()
      Method isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegalTest verifies that method isMoveStudentFromLobby returns the correct boolean values according to the availability of places in the board's table

      @Test void isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal()
      Method isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal verifies if method isMoveStudentsToLobbyLegal returns the correct boolean value according to the correct cloudID

      Test islandOwnerTest verifies the correct setting of an island's owner and the resulting possibility of moving towers onto it.

    • getPlayableAssistantCardTest

      @Test void getPlayableAssistantCardTest()
      Method getPlayableAssistantCardTest verifies the correct update of a player's Assistant deck after a play assistand card phase.

    • mergeTwoIslandsTest

      @Test void mergeTwoIslandsTest()
      Method mergeTwoIslandsTest verifies the correct merge of two islands as a result of towers' placement onto neighbour islands.

    • moveAndInfluenceTest

      @Test void moveAndInfluenceTest()
      Test moveAndInfluenceTest verifies the correct execution of a combined action of Mother nature movement and influence computation, as planned during action phase.

    • influenceAndMergeTest

      @Test void influenceAndMergeTest()
      The following tests performs an island merge between two islands and moves Mother Nature two times, in order to assure the correct update of the islands' arraylist.

    • isCardPlayableTest

      @Test void isCardPlayableTest()
      Test isCardPlayableTest verifies the correct update of Assistant cards that can be played by each player. It is also tested the case of player having a single, already played card.

    • cloudEmptinessTest

      @Test void cloudEmptinessTest()
      Test cloudEmptinessTest verifies the correct refill of cloud students when basket is empty: if a cloud cannot be fully refilled then no students are added to it.

    • resetAssistantCardTest

      @Test void resetAssistantCardTest()
      Test resetAssistantCardTest verifies the correct reset of current turn's assistant cards at the end of a game round.

    • actionPhaseOrderTest

      @Test void actionPhaseOrderTest()
      Test actionPhaseOrderTest verifies the correct setting of action phase order as a result of assistant cards' selection.

    • hasDuplicatesTest

      @Test void hasDuplicatesTest()
      This test helps verifying that a student tile is not choosen more than once in a movement.
